directions: Steam or boil broccoli until tender, approximately 4 to 8 minutes. Drain.
In a small saucepan, melt butter over medium low heat.  Remove from heat.  Stir in lemon juice. lemon zest, and almonds.  Pour over hot broccoli, and serve.
ingredients: 1 head fresh broccoli, cut into florets
title: Broccoli With Lemon Almond Butter
